description: Fixed point of "n -> n/2 or (n+1)/2 until result is prime".
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: upp[ n_Integer ] := FixedPoint[ If[ EvenQ[ # ]&&#>2, #/2, If[ PrimeQ[ # ]||(#=== 1), #, (#+1)/2 ] ]&, n, 20 ]
prog: (Haskell)a039635 1 = 1a039635 n = until ((== 1) . a010051) ((flip div 2) . (+ 1)) n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 17 2013
author: _Wouter Meeussen_
